main event: A witness in Yorba Linda, California reported seeing a bright red UFO object on August 9, 1967 around 8:39 PM.
interesting points: The object hovered for about 30 seconds before moving extremely fast straight up and away.
The witness reported seeing more than one light on the object.
The witness was able to see the trail of the object after it had moved away.
The witness works for the ROP field unit of the San Clemente Police Department and has been interested in UFOs for many years.
The report was sent to the Department of the Air Force, Foreign Technology Division (AFSC) at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio.
sighted object: bright red UFO object with more than one light
witnesses: 1 witness, who works for the ROP field unit of the San Clemente Police Department
